charges.charge_description: 18 USC 7 &; 13: Count 1 DUI ORC 4511.19(a)(1) 30days-6mos/$500-$2500/SA: $10/1yr-10yrs license revoc; (3rd DUI within 6 yrs) Count 2 DRIVING W/PROHIBITED BREATH ALCOHOL LEVEL ORC 4511.19(a)(3) Penalty-same as Ct 1-; Count 3 LEFT OF CENTER ORC 4511.25 $100/SA: $5; Count 4 SPEEDING ORC 4511.21 $100/SA: $5; Count 5 DUS-reinstatement fee required ORC 4507.02(c)

charges.charge_disposition: Count 1: Prob 2 yrs o/c: 80 days confinement w/vol surrender; attend &; successfully complete any substance abuse treatment as deemed appropriate by PO; pay fine during first 18 mos of supv at $30 per mth; SA due immediately; License SUSP for 2 yrs; Fine $500; SA: $10; Counts 2-5 dismissed upon mot of Govt; Ct rptr: Monna McCormick; (-1)
